name: Streaming SQL Copier
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline copies data from a streaming source in a standard format without parsing the payload and writes it to a streaming sink.

parameters.name: sourceType
parameters.label: sourceType
parameters.helpText: Type of the source. Valid types are: [pubsub, pubsublite, kafka]

parameters.name: sourceLocation
parameters.label: sourceLocation
parameters.helpText: Location within the source to read from. See README.

parameters.name: sourceOptions
parameters.label: sourceOptions
parameters.helpText: Additional options for configuring the source. See README.

parameters.name: sinkType
parameters.label: sinkType
parameters.helpText: Type of the sink. Valid types are: [pubsub, pubsublite, kafka, bigquery]

parameters.name: sinkLocation
parameters.label: sinkLocation
parameters.helpText: Location within the sink to write to. See README.

parameters.name: sinkOptions
parameters.label: sinkOptions
parameters.helpText: Additional options for configuring the sink. See README.
